value.name: And Just Like That…
value.overview: This new chapter of “Sex and the City” follows Carrie, Miranda and Charlotte as they navigate the journey from the complicated reality of life and friendship in their 30s to the even more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

value.name: A Daughter Just Like You
value.overview: Hong Ae-Ja works as a host at a home shopping channel. She has three accomplished daughters: Ji-Sung, In-Sung and Hee-Sung. Hong Ae-Ja's family interconnects with So Pan-Seok's family and Heo Eun-Sook's as in-laws.

value.name: Something Just Like This
value.overview: Qian Xi Xi grew up living with Duan Ran, a second-generation heir of a rich family. The two childhood sweethearts are inseparable even after they enter the work force as e-commerce entrepreneurs. They experience ups and downs, obstacles and complications that are beyond what they had imagined. But throughout the process, they made friends with people who share similar ambitions and together, they carve out their own path. Follow their journey of discovering true love and fulfilling their dreams.

value.name: Just like Choutokkyuu no Kibou no Tama!
value.original_name: Just like 超特急の希望の玉！
value.overview:
A special program of Super Express will be aired on Special TV for two consecutive weeks!

A 1-digit car and a 2-digit car become buddies and take on the challenge of creating an original MV as a reward!

Last March, Cho Tokkyu appeared on the live show "Cho Tokkyu no The Best Nine produced by SPACE SHOWER TV" hosted by Space Shower TV.

This year marks 10 years since the first appearance on Special TV, and we were trying to build a closer relationship, but when we checked the VTR that was played at the end of this event, we saw the "Ball of Hope" lit up in cooperation with car No. 8. It was discovered that it disappeared when the event ended...

In order to light up the "ball of hope" once again, this time the members of the second-digit car will be given a test.

Shuya, Masahiro, Aroha, and Haru will take on missions given to them in order to strengthen their respective responsibilities in a buddy system with the members of the number 1 car following each other!
